messages.body: $AAPL There will be a grand opportunity to accumulate shares soon. This company isn't going away any time in our lifetimes.

Warren Buffett was very bullish on Apple in early-2017. I wonder what he's doing now.

$AAPL
$AAPL glad I‚Äôm not short going into Monday - awful last few trading days - back up
